Delete task confirmation content: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this task ?
Delete step confirmation content: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this step ?
Delete set confirmation content: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this set ?
Delete card confirmation content: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this card ?
Delete multiple card confirmation conten: Are you sure you want to permanently delete %s cards ?
Delete account confirmation content: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account ?
Study Streak congrats: Congratulation you have been studying for %s days in a row!
Info tap card: You can tap the card to see its other side.
Info swipe card: You can swipe left (Don't Know) or right (Know) and go the next card.
Info swipe left card: You are still learning the card.
Info written mode enter: If your answer hasn't been checked yet it will be checked, otherwise go to the next card.
Info written mode ctrl enter: Add a new line to your answer.
Info written mode: Your answer will be compared to the other side of the card. When comparing the case is ignored.
set finished perfect: 🌟 Your mastery is undeniable! Your dedication to learning is truly inspiring. Keep up the incredible work, and you'll continue to excel in your studies! 📚🚀
set finished congrats: 🌟 Wow! You're on fire! Your near-perfect score is proof of your dedication and hard work. Keep it up, and you'll conquer any challenge that comes your way! 🚀
set finished congrats 2: 🎉 Congratulations! Your outstanding result shows your dedication and hard work. Keep up the fantastic work ! 💪
set finished great: 👏 Great work! Your result shows your commitment to learning. Keep using CorrectInk, and you'll continue to improve and achieve even greater success! 📚💪
set finished great 2: 🚀 Keep up the hard work, and you'll continue to make great strides in your learning journey. Success is a series of small steps, and you're on the right path! 💪📚🌟
set finished OK: 👏 Good effort! You're making progress, and that's what matters most. Keep studying and practicing, and you'll see even better results in the future. You've got this! 📚👍
set finished learning: 💪 Don't be disheartened by your result! Every great journey has its bumps. Keep pushing forward, and you'll see progress in no time! 💡🌱💜
Email hint: Enter a valid email like abc@gmail.com
Login page hint: Please login or register a new account.
Sign up hint: Already have an account? Log in.
Error signup: This email is already linked to an account !
Error email invalid: The email your entered is invalid.
Reset password security code: For security reasons we send you a one-time code that will expire in
Enter the code you received by mail: Enter the code you received by mail
Password changed description: You can now login to your account with this new password.
Set saved message:
The set has been saved!
You can now edit it to your will. However you can't change its visibility public.
Error add cards: You are not allowed to add cards to sets that don't belong to you.
Error navigate set: You can't go to this set. It has been deleted or is no longer public
Error update account: The account information could not be updated
Account updated: Your account information has been updated!
Name: Name
Set name hint: Enter the name of your set.
Error edit message: You are not allowed to edit %s that don't belong to you.
Error delete message: You are not allowed to delete %s that don't belong to you.
Error offline sets: You need to be online to see public sets
Placeholder no steps: No steps have been added to this task.
Lenient mode on: 1 typo or 1 added/missing letter is accepted
Lenient mode off: Your input must be identical to the correct answer (case ignored)
Lenient mode correct result: With lenient mode enabled your answer is correct
Info written lenient mode: When lenient mode is enabled 1 substitution or 1 added/missing letter is accepted.
Notification denied: You have not given CorrectInk the permission to push notifications!
Spaced repetition info: Spaced repetition is a learning strategy that optimizes retention by reviewing information at increasing intervals over time to reinforce long-term memory.
Study all cards info: Study all the cards all the time, not matter how well you know them and how often you see them.
Require all answers on: You need to get all the possible answers correctly.
Repeat until known on: The study session continues until all the cards have been correctly answered, repeating those that were answered incorrectly.
Repeat until known off: The study session concludes once all the cards have been reviewed once, the incorrectly answered cards are not revisited.
No cards to study: Currently, you have no cards to study due to the spaced repetition method.
No cards to study info: This method utilizes algorithms to optimize your learning by showing you only the cards that require review to reinforce long-term memory.
No cards to study how to disable: You can disable this option in the set's settings (top right corner).
Get all answers result missing: The option 'Require all possible answer is enabled'
Enter link Image: Enter the URL of an image
Image url invalid: This is not the URL of an image
Error set null: The set could not be fetched correctly, try again later !
Error set null tip: If you were looking at a public set it's possible the owner changed its visibility, or even deleted it.
Error set null tip 2: If you followed a link the set may not be public anymore or may have been deleted.
No tasks uncompleted myDay: You don't have any tasks planned for today!
Delete account confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account ? This action is definitive.
Delete message confirmation content: '%s' will be deleted for every user who received it. This action is definitive.
Existing card found description: A card with the same front has been found in your set, see the comparison below.
Found card modified tip: * modification made to the existing card
Import cards description: Import new cards from a CSV file.
Export set description: Export all the cards of your set to a CSV file.
Set not exported description: The folder is protected and can't be accessed
Set empty description: Add cards manually or import them from a csv file !
Card copied to set: The card has been added to '%s'
No card added to set: No card was added to the set.
Title: Title
Template report set:
The set "<linkto:set>" by <linkto:reportedUser> has been reported by <linkto:reportingUser>.
This set has been flagged inappropriate <reportCount>.
<linkto:previousReport>

#### Report from the user
<reportReasons>

<reportDetails>

#### Your decision
- [Warn the user](action:Warn_the_user)
- [Block the set](action:Block_the_set)
- [Block the user](action:Block_the_user)
- [The set is **not** inappropriate ?](action:Set_not_inappropriate)
Template report action warn:
##### What will happen ?
A message will be send to the user who created the set explaining why it has been reported and the decision taken by the moderators.
It will also encourage the user to edit his set and be more careful.
Template report action block set:
##### What will happen ?
A message will be send to the user who created the set explaining why it has been reported and the decision taken by the moderators.
The set will immediately be made private and can *never* be made public again.
Template report action block user:
##### What will happen ?
A message will be send to the user who created the set explaining why it has been reported and the decision taken by the moderators.
*All* the public set made by this user will be made private and the user will *never* be able to share sets again.
Template report action set appropriate:
##### What will happen ?
A message will be send to user who reported the set thanking him for the report but explaining that the set was found **not** to be in **violation of our guidelines**.
*No* message will be send to the user who got his set reported and the report will be removed from the set.
Template report outcome warn:
Hello **<userName>**, 

After a thorough review by our moderation team, the content of your set "<${MessageHelper.linkToFormat}:set>" was found to be in **violation of our guidelines**.
Indeed, the guidelines your agreed upon specify that the content shared must not have:
<reportReasons>
However this set does not respect this.
As your violation has been deemed light the moderation team decided to **warn** you this time. We encourage you to edit your set and be more mindful of what you share. 

If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out. We're here to support you and ensure the best possible experience for all of our users.

We thank you for using CorrectInk.

> Best regards, 
>  *The CorrectInk Moderation Team*

Terms of services content:
# Agreement To Terms
By accessing and using the CorrectInk app and website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services. All applicable laws, and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws.

## Content Guidelines
If you come across content that violates the following guidelines, please report it to our moderation team. We rely on our users to help maintain a safe environment.
By using our services you agree to abide by the following guidelines:

### 1. Respect Others
Avoid hate speech, harassment, discrimination, or personal attacks.
Do not invade the privacy of other users or share their personal information.
### 2. No Explicit or Violent Content
Content shared on CorrectInk should be appropriate for all audiences.
Avoid violent, or sexually explicit content.
Avoid sharing content that promotes harm, violence, or self-destructive behavior.
### 3. Intellectual Property
Respect copyright and trademark laws.
Do not share content that infringes on someone else's intellectual property rights.
### 4. Accuracy and Honesty
Share accurate and truthful information.
Avoid spreading misinformation or disinformation.

## User Content
You are solely responsible for the content you submit through CorrectInk. By submitting content, you grant CorrectInk a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free, sublicensable, and transferable license to use, reproduce, distribute, prepare derivative works of, display, and perform the content. 

 ## Review and Updates
Our team reserves the right to review and remove any avatars deemed inappropriate.

We may remove content that doesn't explicitly break a specific rule but is considered unsuitable.

## Consequences of Violations
Violating these guidelines may result in a warning, temporary, or permanent ban, depending on the severity. 

## Privacy Policy
Your use of CorrectInk is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and disclose information.

## Limitation of Liability
CorrectInk shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in any way connected with the use of our services by individual customers.

## Governing Law
These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of France and the European Union. 

## Contact Us
If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms of Service, please contact us at [correctink.contact@gmail.com](mailto:correctink.contact@gmail.com).
Privacy policy content:
# Privacy Policy

Welcome to CorrectInk!

By accessing and using the CorrectInk app and website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following Privacy Policy. We take your privacy very seriously. In this privacy notice, we seek to explain to you in the clearest way possible what information we collect, how we use it and what rights you have in relation to it. We hope you take some time to read through it carefully, as it is important. If there are any terms in this privacy notice that you do not agree with, please discontinue use of our Services immediately.

This privacy notice applies to all information collected through our Services (which, as described above, includes our Apps and Website), as well as, any related services, sales, marketing or events.

## Information We Collect

**Account and profile information:** We collect information about you when you register for an account, create or modify your profile, set preferences, sign-up for or make purchases through the Services. For example, this includes your email address, profile picture, and notification settings.

**Information you provide through our support channels:** The Services also include customer support, where you may choose to submit information regarding a problem you are experiencing with a Service. Whether you contact customer support via email, or otherwise engage with our support team, you will be asked to provide contact information, a summary of the problem you are experiencing, and any other documentation, screenshots or information that would be helpful in resolving the issue.

**Information we collect automatically:** We collect information about you when you use our Services, including browsing our websites and taking certain actions within the Services. This includes:

- Internet Protocol (IP) addresses.
- Internet Service Provider (ISP).
- Browser type.
- Operating system.
- Date/time stamp.
- Browsing actions and browsing patterns.

**Cookies and other tracking technologies:** Cookies are small text files sent by us to your computer or mobile device, which enable features and functionalities of the Services. They are unique to your account or your browser. Session-based cookies last only while your browser is open and are automatically deleted when you close your browser. Persistent cookies last until you or your browser delete them or until they expire. For example, we collect and store the following information using Cookies:

- Authentication information: If you are signed in to our Services, cookies help us show you the right information and personalize your experience.
- Document referrer information.
- URL query.
- Information about which variant(s) of the Services you use.

## How we use the information

How we use the information we collect depends in part on which Services you use, how you use them, and any preferences you have communicated to us. Below are the specific purposes for which we use the information we collect about you:

- To provide the Services.
- To personalize your experience.
- To aid in research and development.
- To communicate with you about the Services.
- To market, promote, and drive engagement with the Services.
- To provide customer support.
- To prevent fraud and abuse.
- For any other purpose with your consent.

## How we share the information

**Sharing with third parties**

**Service providers:** We work with third-party service providers to provide website and application development, hosting, maintenance, backup, storage, infrastructure, analysis and other services for us, which may require them to access or use information about you. If a service provider needs to access information about you to perform services on our behalf, they do so under instruction from us, including abiding by policies and procedures designed to protect your information. You can learn more about third-party service providers in the Subprocessors section.

**With your consent:** We share information about you with third parties when you give us consent to do so.

**Compelled disclosure:** We reserve the right to use or disclose your Personal Information if required by law or if we reasonably believe that use or disclosure is necessary to protect our rights, protect your safety or the safety of others, investigate fraud, or comply with a law, court order, or legal process.

## How we store and secure the information

**Information storage and security**

We use data hosting service providers to host the information we collect, and we use technical measures to secure your data. While we implement safeguards designed to protect your information, no security system is impenetrable and due to the inherent nature of the Internet, we cannot guarantee that data, during transmission through the Internet or while stored on our systems or otherwise in our care, is absolutely safe from intrusion by others. We will respond to requests about information storage and security within a reasonable timeframe.

**Infrastructure Subprocessors**

We may use the following Subprocessors to host Customer Data or provide other infrastructure that helps with delivery of our Services:

| Entity Name | Subprocessing Activities | Entity Country | Data Location |
|-------------|--------------------------|----------------|---------------|
| Vercel | Cloud Platform Services | United States | Europe |
| Amazon Web Services EMEA SARL | Cloud Service Provider | Luxembourg | Europe |

## How long we keep information

We may retain your personal information for a period of time consistent with the original purpose of collection. For instance, we may retain your personal information during the time you have an account to use the Services, and for a reasonable period of time thereafter. We also may retain your personal information during the period of time needed for us to pursue our legitimate business interests, conduct audits, comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.

## How to access and control your information

**Right to access and update information**

Our Services and related documentation give you the ability to access and update certain information about you from within the Service. For example, you can access your profile information from your account. You can update your profile information within your profile settings.

In addition to the abilities we provide from within the Services, you may request to access or update your information using the contact information at the end of this Privacy Policy. We will respond to your request within a reasonable timeframe and notify you of the action we have taken.

**Right to delete your information**

Our Services and related documentation give you the ability to delete certain information about you from within the Service. For example, you can remove certain profile information within your profile settings or completely terminate your account.

In addition to the abilities we provide from within the Services, you may request to delete your information using the contact information at the end of this Privacy Policy. We will respond to your request within a reasonable timeframe and notify you of the action we have taken.

**Right to restrict information processing**

In some cases, you may ask us to stop accessing, storing, using and otherwise processing your information where you believe we don't have the appropriate rights to do so.

To exercise this right, please send us your request using the contact information at the end of this Privacy Policy. We will respond to your request within a reasonable timeframe and notify you of the action we have taken.

**Right to data portability**

Data portability is the ability to obtain some of your information in a format you can move from one service provider to another. Our Services and related documentation give you the ability to export certain information from within the Service. Should you request it by contacting us using the contact information at the end of this Privacy Policy, we will provide you with an electronic file of your basic account information and information under your sole control. We will respond to your request within a reasonable timeframe and notify you of the action we have taken.

## Other important privacy-related information

We collect information globally. We transfer, process, and store your information outside of your country of residence, to wherever we, CorrectInk or our third-party service providers operate for the purpose of providing you the Services. Whenever we transfer your information, we take steps to protect it.

#### Age limitations
To the extent prohibited by applicable law, We do not allow use of the Services by anyone younger than 13 years old. If you learn that anyone younger than 13 has unlawfully provided us with personal data, please contact us and we will take steps to delete such information.

#### Changes to our Privacy Policy
We may change this privacy policy from time to time. We will post any privacy policy changes on this page and, if the changes are significant, we will provide a more prominent notice by adding a notice on the Services homepages, login screens, or by sending you an email notification. We encourage you to review our privacy policy whenever you use the Services to stay informed about our information practices and the ways you can help protect your privacy.

If you disagree with any changes to this privacy policy, you will need to stop using the Services and deactivate or delete your account(s).

#### Contact Us
Your information is controlled by CorrectInk. If you have questions or concerns about how your information is handled, please direct your inquiry to CorrectInk at [correctink.contact@gmail.com](mailto:correctink.contact@gmail.com).
